title: Python Programming & Quantitative Trading Education
description: Interactive Jupyter notebooks teaching Python fundamentals and quantitative trading strategies. Designed for self-paced learning with embedded assessments and real-world applications.

projects.title: Python for Beginners - Week 1
projects.description: Introduction to Python programming covering basic syntax, print() function, and comments. Designed for self-paced learning with embedded practice exercises and clear explanations for learners with no prior programming experience.
learningObjectives: Understand what Python is and its applications
Use the print() function to display output
Write comments in code for documentation
Execute Python code in Jupyter notebooks
projects.targetAudience: Beginners with no prior programming experience

projects.title: Trading Strategy Backtesting Tutorial
projects.description: Comprehensive tutorial on backtesting trading strategies using Python. Covers data collection, strategy implementation, performance visualization, and basic metrics calculation. Includes practical examples with moving average crossover strategies.
learningObjectives: Download financial data using Python libraries
Build and test trading strategies programmatically
Visualize performance with charts and candlesticks
projects.targetAudience: Intermediate Python users interested in quantitative trading

projects.title: Trading Strategy Backtesting - Detailed Explanation
projects.description: Expanded version of the backtesting tutorial with detailed explanations, step-by-step walkthroughs, and comprehensive project organization guidance. Includes suggested folder structures and best practices for quantitative trading projects.
learningObjectives: Understand project structure for quantitative trading
Apply best practices for code organization
projects.targetAudience: Intermediate to advanced Python users building quantitative trading systems

projects.title: Investment Ebook Cover Art
projects.description: Cover artwork for the 'Trading & Investing for Beginners' educational book. Demonstrates visual design skills in creating professional educational materials.
